actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the fuel economy standards used in determining the gas guzzler tax and to increase the rates of such tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the fuel economy standards and the rates of the gas guzzler tax.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the fuel economy standards used in determining the gas guzzler tax and to increase the rates of such tax.
